statements: UPSERT INTO products (product_id, product_name, supplier_id, price, description) VALUES (1, 'Laptop', 1, 1200.00, 'High-performance laptop') ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET product_name = 'Updated Laptop', supplier_id = 2, price = 1250.00, description = 'Updated description';

UPSERT INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_number, address) VALUES (1, 'Supplier 1', '123-456-7890', '123 Supplier St.') ON CONFLICT (supplier_id) DO UPDATE SET supplier_name = 'Updated Supplier 1', contact_number = '987-654-3210', address = '987 New Supplier St.';

UPSERT INTO products (product_id, product_name, supplier_id, price, description) VALUES (2, 'Mouse', 2, 15.00, 'Wireless mouse') ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET product_name = 'Updated Mouse', supplier_id = 3, price = 18.00, description = 'Updated mouse description';
UPSERT INTO products (id, name, price) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 19.99) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Product A', price = 19.99
UPSERT INTO products (id, name, price) VALUES (2, 'Product B', 29.99) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Product B', price = 29.99
UPSERT INTO orders (id, product_id, quantity, total_amount) VALUES (1, 1, 2, 39.98) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_id = 1, quantity = 2, total_amount = 39.98
INSERT INTO products (product_id, product_name, price) VALUES (1, 'Hard Drive', 50.99) ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET product_name = 'Hard Drive', price = 50.99;
INSERT INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name, location) VALUES (1, 'Supplier A', 'New York') ON CONFLICT (supplier_id) DO UPDATE SET supplier_name = 'Supplier A', location = 'New York';

INSERT INTO orders (order_id, product_id, supplier_id, quantity, order_date) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 10, '2022-10-15') ON CONFLICT (order_id) DO UPDATE SET product_id = 1, supplier_id = 1, quantity = 10, order_date = '2022-10-15';
UPSERT INTO supplier (supplier_id, supplier_name, address) VALUES (1, 'Supplier A', '123 Main Street') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE supplier_name = 'Supplier A', address = '123 Main Street';
UPSERT INTO product (product_id, product_name, supplier_id, price) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 1, 100.00) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_name = 'Product A', supplier_id = 1, price = 100.00;
UPSERT INTO customer (customer_id, customer_name, address) VALUES (1, 'Customer A', '456 Broadway') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE customer_name = 'Customer A', address = '456 Broadway';

UPSERT INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_person, contact_number) VALUES (1, 'Supplier 1', 'Location 1', 'Person 1', '123456789') ON CONFLICT (supplier_id) DO UPDATE SET supplier_name = 'Supplier 1', supplier_location = 'Location 1', contact_person = 'Person 1', contact_number = '123456789';

UPSERT INTO products (product_id, product_name, unit_price, supplier_id) VALUES (1, 'Product 1', 10.50, 1) ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET product_name = 'Product 1', unit_price = 10.50, supplier_id = 1;

UPSERT INTO warehouses (warehouse_id, warehouse_name, location, capacity) VALUES (1, 'Warehouse 1', 'Location 1', 100) ON CONFLICT (warehouse_id) DO UPDATE SET warehouse_name = 'Warehouse 1', location = 'Location 1', capacity = 100;
